DOC.brief_summary: Combination therapy glinides premixed insulin provide good glycemic control premixed insulin alone .
DOC.detailed_description: Type 2 diabetic patient undergoing twice daily injection premixed insulin administer glinides ( 10mg mitiglinide 90 mg nateglinide ) lunchtime without change insulin regimen . Twelve week administration glinides , discontinue . HbA1c level start glinide administration , 12 week administration , 12 week discontinuation measure .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis type 2 diabetes Who undergo twice daily injection premixed insulin Whose HbA1c 6.5 % le 8.0 % Whose change HbA1c 1.0 % 12 week observational period
